aboutme1: I live in Dallas, Texas with my husband and 3 children. I love the outdoors and working hard to accomplish something meaningful.
aboutme2: My lifelong love of learning prompted me to pursue a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering after my oldest child was born. Through the ups and downs I have learned so much, I can truly say I have loved the journey!
workhistory1: With 9 years' experience in customer service, logistics, and administrative support, I am quick under pressure and highly organized.
